attributes.action: Consider prosecution similar to rape laws for multiple sexual partners.
attributes.additional_details: Rape is illegal, it has catostopic consequences for those that don't consent and leaves behind a wake of hate, guilt, self loathing and mental health issues. Hense why it is rightly so, illegal Undeniably leaving life changing scars both physically and mentally. Yet we currently have no law at all against protecting human rights against deliberate sexual acts with additional sexual partners. Such acts leave behind very similar catastrophic mental scaring, self hate and other mental/physical scar
attributes.background: I would.like to see action taken against those people who take upon them self to have sexual relations with multiple people and feel as its not consensual between 2 adults and normally only 1 adult is aware it should follow similar guidelines to rape and serial abuse. It is just as damaging

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

If a person is engaging in sexual activities with multiple sexual partners then each person would need to give consent to any sexual activity they engaged in.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
